resources.string: Land Surveying Tehcnician, Design Professionals, Inc.
Designed and built an Android based prototype using NFC to initiate transactions. The application takes advantage of tools like Firebase and Retrofit to achieve this.
Surveyed properties and provided data to clients and Civil Engineers, as well as direct interaction with clients to assess and implement project plans.
Provided support and solutions for employee\'s IT hardware and software issues, and developed communication skills by working with people from all positions within the company.
Java, Kotlin, Python, C, C++, Scheme, and SML

I first learned Java in high school, so it is generally my preferred language, which made learning Kotlin much easier. I have a lot of experience in Python from classes at UConn, and have used C for multithreading, pipes, and sockets. I\'m currently learning C++ and SML in classes as well.
